info.brief_description: Five students stumble on a mysterious lab at the end of a shadowy path on campus.
info.description:
THE CAST:
The Students:
Brett, 19, male, glasses and the geeky look of most engineering students.
Cindy, 18, female, smart and cute redheaded business student.
Liz, 19, female, Blonde big-boobed Bi bimbo and proud of it. Also a business student.
Jay, 18, male, Athletic scholarship student.
Rae, 18, female, shy, pretty African-American History major.

Other Characters:
Dr. Monique Wills, female, late 20s, glasses. Brunette Caucasian. Looks like a typical young research scientist except for her bustline (bigger than Liz.) Chief Scientist of the Institute
Dr. Rebecca Fremont, female, late 20s. Tall, slender African-American. Surgeon and researcher at the Institute. Dr. Wills' lover.
Crystal Caucasian blonde grad student and tech at the institute
Avery Asian-American grad student and tech at the institute
(If others add characters I would like to see more of, I will add them to this list.)

The story: Five college students accidentally get involved in experiments that are a bit beyond what normally constitutes university research.

Please note that I am able to edit your chapters, so email me if you want to fix something. Also, I can change the choices on any chapter, so if you have an idea which is different from what is offered, email me and describe your plan. Also email me if you have an idea but don't think you are up to writing it; I may write it into the story with a note giving you credit for the idea (unless you request to stay anon.)

THE RULES for adding chapters:
It's XGC. Impregnate characters, kill characters, add characters, clone characters, fuse characters, hell, go for it! Just abide by the following:

Rule the 1) Stay in third person (narrative is 'he' or 'she' not 'I' or 'You') so people can easily change focus from one character to another.

Rule the 2) I've got a really wide perception of what constitutes 'erotic' (check my other interactives for evidence), but keep it erotic. It's in the title!

Rule the 3) Stick to the 'reality' of the thread you are on. Different branches will have different realities, but don't ignore what was stated in the previous chapters on your thread.

Rule the 4) No one-liner chapters and do not end the thread before chapter 20!

Rule the 5) Unless it is at least chapter 20 and you are ending the thread, CHECK AND FILL IN ALL THE CHOICES. I (and most readers) hate chapters with only one 'choice'. Early chapters can have more than two. If you can't decide, then just put 'something else' in the other choice(s), check them and leave them available for others!

Also, not a rule but a request: Erotic interactives with topics other than vore, unbirth, growth or shrinkage are in short supply here on WDC, so only go that direction if you have a truly new idea. Don't waste this one on more of the same old thing. (I won't get mad, so if you've got a good idea, go ahead. I just would like more exploration of other kinds of erotica around here, but I'm good with something on these topics with more originality.)

If you enjoy reading, try adding a chapter! Don't be afraid! The worst that can happen is I go in to dust, clean up and correct spelling.
